notes_translated.fr: Le bottin des services de police du Québec, comprenant aussi les services de police autochtones et les autres types de services de police, permet de repérer rapidement les organisations policières du Québec.
notes_translated.en-t-fr: The directory of Quebec police services, including Aboriginal policing services and other types of police services, makes it possible to quickly identify Quebec police organizations.
